amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out certain major medical facility projects for which appropriations are being made for fiscal year 2016.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3944 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2968) To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out certain major medical facility projects for which appropriations are being made for fiscal year 2016.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3944 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
